messages.subject: upcoming blog carnival
messages.msgSnippet: September s theme: What s cooking unschoolers? Any blogs about unschooling food, or share some good cooking and kitchen stories - even recipes! New and old
messages.messageBody:
September's theme: What's cooking unschoolers? Any blogs about unschooling food, or share some good cooking and kitchen stories - even recipes! New and old posts are welcome. Email me links at: plaidpanties666@...
TIA
Meredith

and feel free to pass this along

messages.subject: upcoming blog carnival
messages.msgSnippet: For anyone interested in participating! Summer is traditionally the season of travel - who s travelling? Where are you going and what are doing for fun these
messages.messageBody:
For anyone interested in participating!

Summer is traditionally the season of travel - who's travelling? Where are you going and what are doing for fun these days? Are you going to a conference? Visiting family? Hiding in the back of beyond?

Alternately, where is life taking you metaphorically? What journeys do your kids take you on - into unexpected, uncharted parenting waters? Are they intrepid back yard adventurers?

So, for the first of July, email me your links: plaidpanties666@...

Or to my inbox at RUN, if you're a member there. I'll post a link here on U.Basics once its all together. Look forward to reading your blogs, y'all!

---Meredith
